This game is like a really attractive significant other that routinely beats the shit out of you and makes fun of you in front of their parents. When it's good it's great. When it's not good you'll want to chuck a hot toaster into your family's hot tub.

It plays like butter on everything except a TI-84, sounds great, and has some of the tightest controls of any shooter that I've ever played. It really stands the test of time for a game released in 2012 as far as mechanics are concerned.

My beef with this game is it's community. If this game's community were a vat of liquid and you fell into it, you'd pop out the other end of the vat looking like Jack Nicholson's Joker. You'll get your head bitten off for not pulling off a 1v3 and kicked from the game on round 29 of 30 just as quickly because the other guys on your team are all in a Discord call and think it's funny.

Great if you're a sadist and enjoy mental cock and ball torture. Terrible if you're trying to unwind after another shitty day on 3rd shift. Approach at your own risk.
